name: jsonrpc
description: An unopinionated JSONRPC router for JavaScript

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run lint-js && npm run build-es5 && npm run build-webpack && npm run build-minify
scripts.build-es5: babel src --out-dir lib/src && babel test --out-dir lib/test
scripts.test: npm run clean && npm run lint-js && npm run build-es5 && mocha lib/test

author: Cerner Corporation
